definition: to wrap, i.e. roll or dress

translations.bg: да се увива, т.е. да се навива или облича
translations.da: at pakke ind, dvs. rulle eller klæde sig på
translations.el: να τυλίξετε, δηλαδή να τυλίξετε ή να ντύσετε
translations.es: envolver, es decir, enrollar o vestir
translations.id: untuk membungkus, yaitu menggulung atau membalut
translations.lt: įvynioti, t. y. suvynioti arba aprengti
translations.nb: å pakke inn, dvs. rulle eller kle på
translations.pt: embrulhar, ou seja, enrolar ou vestir
translations.ro: a înfășura, adică a înfășura sau a îmbrăca
translations.sk: zabaliť, t. j. zrolovať alebo obliecť
translations.sv: att linda in, dvs. rulla eller klä
translations.tr: sarmak, yani rulo yapmak veya giydirmek
